## Question 1: Means

Find the mean of the vector `a`

```{r, version = "A"}
set.seed(123)
```

```{r, version = "B"}
set.seed(456)
```

```{r}
a <- rnorm(10)
```


%%%
version: solution

The mean is `r mean(a)`
